intro: Groutia, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its rosette-shaped leaves and vibrant, showy flowers. Its botanical features make it a favorite among plant enthusiasts and gardeners alike.
